dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S77 IS: Patient Choice Restoration Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Vitter introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To repeal the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Patient Choice Restoration Act.

subsection.text: The following Acts, and the amendments made by such Acts, are repealed:

paragraph.text: The Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (Public Law 111–148).
The Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010 (Public Law 111–152).

subsection.text: The provisions of law amended by the Acts referred to in subsection (a) are restored as if such Acts had never been enacted.
